entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor - Offer a way to force browsers to reload bundle.scp.css files #57472
  • Perf regression: endpoint #57468
  • Perf improvement: https #57467
  • Update to .NET 10 #57461
    10.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Build acceleration breaks blazor web apps. #57460
    9.0-rc2
  • Cookie auth (with identity) for MAUI Blazor (BlazorWebView) - iOS and Android? #57456
  • Unable to achieve eventcallback from reusable razor component in blazor webassembly #57457
  • [Blazor] Enable custom text in the new (.Net 9.0) reconnect dialog #57453
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Deprecating `area-web-frameworks` label #57452

Closed

  • Naming inconsistency on `ISkipStatusCodePagesMetadata` feature #57382
  • Test failure: no exception in ResultsOfTResult1TResult2_Throws_InvalidOperationException_WhenResultIsNull #57360
    10.0-preview1
  • Perf regression: endpoint, updates #57455
  • InputSelect Component has potentially a bug. On EditForm submit (Static SSR), it causes InputText field not to databind to the model. #57350
    9.0-rc2
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `aspnetcore/release/9.0-rc1` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #57341
  • NavigationManager in SSR navigates from https to http #57454
  • Smarter IResponse content types #55882
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware, plaintext #57447
  • IEndpointAddressScheme (RouteValuesAddressScheme) FindEndpoints returns incorrect Endpoint in ASP.NET Core MVC (both 6 and 7) #51549

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `3e3b44c` to `ff233bd` #57475
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `3e3b44c` to `ff233bd` #57474
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Fix StreamPool_MultipleStreamsConcurrent_StreamsReturnedToPool #57473
    area-networking
  • Unquarantine Frame_MultipleStreams_RequestsNotFinished_DefaultMaxStreamsPerConnection_EnhanceYourCalmAfterDoubleMaxStreams #57471
    area-networking
  • ApiExplorer Support for HttpResults types for Controllers #57464
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Fix race in RST_STREAM_IncompleteRequest_AdditionalWindowUpdateFrame_ConnectionAborted #57450
    area-networking

Merged

  • Add README to Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.RuntimeCompilation package #54508
    area-mvc, 10.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #57469
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • fix: Correct interface filename to match interface name for `ISkipStatusCodePagesMetadata` #57441
    community-contribution, area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Fix ResultsOfTGenerated tests #57465
    area-minimal, area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • [release/9.0] Add references to new 9.0 branches in .yml files #57463
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 9.0-rc2

Updated

  • Removing unsafe code in BufferExtensions #57417
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Fix code generation for parsing optional array parameters in RequestDelegateGenerator #57336
    community-contribution, feature-rdg, area-minimal, area-networking
  • Upgrade xunit version to 2.9.0 #57303
    area-infrastructure
  • Treating empty string in form post as null for nullable value types #52499
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add analyzer for custom IProblemDetailsWriter registration #49286
    area-mvc, analyzer, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal
